channel.title: personal on Ruben Krueger
channel.description: Recent content in personal on Ruben Krueger

item.description: My life hangs in the balance; there are two paths in front of me, and I don’t control which one my life takes. I applied to dozens of medical schools, and almost every single one has rejected me — except for one school I interviewed at in January, and I am waiting to hear back from. The medical school application process is long, but to not have an acceptance this late is not a good sign.
